column3: I really believe there are things nobody would see if I didn't photograph them.
Photography is a major force in explaining man to man.
Painting is a nail to which I fasten my ideas.
There is only one valuable thing in art: the thing you cannot explain.
Of all lies, art is the least untrue.
I don't paint things. I only paint the difference between things.
A picture is a poem without words.
An artist's only concern is to shoot for some kind of perfection, and on his own terms, not anyone else's.
An artist cannot speak about his art any more than a plant can discuss horticulture.
An artist must be free to choose what he does, certainly, but he must also never be afraid to do what he might choose.
I prefer drawing to talking. Drawing is faster, and leaves less room for lies.
If you cannot learn to love real art, at least learn to hate sham art and reject it.
What I wish to show when I paint is the way I see things with my eyes and in my heart.
Insight is the first condition of Art.
Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
My paintings are not about what is seen. They are about what is known forever in the mind.
Trifles make perfection, and perfection is no trifle.
Be careful that you do not write or paint anything that is not your own, that you don't know in your own soul.
Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.
In an artwork you're always looking for artistic decisions, so an ashtray is perfect. An ashtray has got life and death.
I hope to live all my life for my art, without abandoning my principles one iota.
Vitality is radiated from exceptional art and architecture.
Artists don't make objects. Artists make mythologies.
The artist's job is to be a witness to his time in history.
My hand is the extension of the thinking process - the creative process.
Where thou art, that is home.
